description: AI 可编程工作流平台 - 基于 VSCode 的工作流 IDE
post_install: foreach ($path in @($homeConfig, $homeState, $extensionsDir, $roamingDir, $programsDir)) { if (-not (Test-Path $path)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $path -Force | Out-Null } }

if (Test-Path $appDataPath) { $item = Get-Item $appDataPath -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($item -and -not $item.LinkType) { Copy-Item "$appDataPath\*" $roamingDir -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item $appDataPath -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }

if (Test-Path $localProgramsPath) { $item = Get-Item $localProgramsPath -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($item -and -not $item.LinkType) { Copy-Item "$localProgramsPath\*" $programsDir -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item $localProgramsPath -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }

if (Test-Path $userProfileDataPath) { $item = Get-Item $userProfileDataPath -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($item -and -not $item.LinkType) { Copy-Item "$userProfileDataPath\*" $homeConfig -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item $userProfileDataPath -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }

if (Test-Path $userProfileStudioPath) { $item = Get-Item $userProfileStudioPath -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($item -and -not $item.LinkType) { Copy-Item "$userProfileStudioPath\*" $homeState -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item $userProfileStudioPath -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }
